But keeping it concise as requested means focusing on one concrete suggestion rather than vague compliments.</think>Bianca, a genuine pleasure to meet you here at the *Inn di Calle della Misericordia*. Perhaps we could collaborate on commissions? My bakeries find steady demand in high-class neighborhoods, and your artisan connections might be perfect to balance supply with quality.
